Sharktilities.credits: Various utility blocks for various operations made by SharkPool

YouTube-Operations.credits: Fetch and play Youtube videos and statistics in your project. Made by SharkPool and contributed to by Nekl300

Time-Calculation.credits: Blocks for calculating time differences. Made by SharkPool

Scratch-Utilities.credits: Blocks for fetching Scratch statistics and info. Made by SharkPool, inspired by NexusKitton's S-Grab

Seeds.credits: Generate random seeded numbers, generated terrain, and more! Made by SharkPool

Tune-Shark-V3.credits: Advanced Audio Engine with Complex Sound Control, Audio Effects and More. Made by SharkPool

Tune-Shark.credits: Outdated Sound Engine for playing sounds. Please use Tune Shark V3. Made by SharkPool, inspired by LilyMakesThings

Added-Motion.credits: New Motion Blocks made by SharkPool

Geometry-Dash-API.credits: Fetch Geometry Dash statistics and information. Made by SharkPool and GD Colon. Thank you RobTopGames.

Sound-Waves.credits: Play various oscillators in your project. Made by SharkPool

Hyper-Sense.credits: New Sensing Blocks. Made by SharkPool

Better-Input.credits: Expansion of the 'Ask and Wait' block. Made by SharkPool

Camera-Sensing-Plus.credits: Expansion of the Video Sensing Extension. Display the Camera on Sprites and take Screenshots! Made by SharkPool

Particle-Engine.credits: Create Highly Customizable Particle Engines with NO Clones. Made by SharkPool

Particle-Tools.credits: Tools that make creating Particle Systems Easy! Made by SharkPool

Sprite-Effects.credits: Apply new, non-vanilla effects and filters to Sprites and the Canvas! Faster than Image Effects. Made by SharkPool

Image-Effects.credits: Apply new, non-vanilla effects and edits to Images and Sprites! Made by SharkPool

Image-Editor.credits: Create and Edit the Pixel Data of Images. Made by SharkPool

Pixel-Utilities.credits: Some Utility Blocks that Roltycore 2's Developer made for some reason. Made by LittleBlueGamer

Recording.credits: Utility blocks for recording yourself while your project runs. Made by SharkPool

Newgrounds-Audio.credits: Fetch Audio and Audio Information from Newgrounds. Made by SharkPool, works best with Tune Shark

Sprite-Parenting.credits: Link sprites together and make them follow the parent's data. Made by SharkPool

Lazy-Collisions.credits: Utility blocks that make detecting collisions easy and fast. Made by SharkPool and Food

Files-Expanded.credits: New Blocks added to GarboMuffin's File Extension. Made by SharkPool, Drago Cuven and 0znzw

Monitors-Plus.credits: New Variable Blocks and New Monitor types. Made by SharkPool and DogeIsCut

Sty-Lists.credits: Customize and Organize Lists Monitors. Made by SharkPool

Gamepad-Expanded.credits: New Blocks added to Garbomuffin's Gamepad Extension. Made by DNin01 and Meehdrescher

Tile-Grids.credits: Place Sprites on Tile Grids. Made by SharkPool

Since-2000.credits: An expansion of the Since 2000 Blocks. Made By ION, modified by 0znzw

Animations.credits: Create Animations and Keyframes in Your Project. Made by SharkPool. TheShovel helped make this Thumbnail

Pause-Utilities.credits: Pause your Project, Scripts, and Make Pause Menus. Made by SharkPool

Text-to-Speech.credits: Better Text to Speech using TikTok API. Made by SharkPool

Messages-Plus.credits: Powerful New Message Blocks that work with Vanilla Messages! Made by SharkPool

Advanced-Messages.credits: New Message Broadcast Blocks for Advanced Purposes. Made by SharkPool

Fetch-Progress.credits: Fetch and Encode Content from URLs while viewing the Progress and Status of the Fetch. Made by SharkPool

Geolocation.credits: Get Users' Location and Calculate Real-World Distances. Made by SharkPool

Spotify.credits: Fetch Statistics and Information and Play Songs from Spotify. Made by SharkPool

SoundCloud-API.credits: Fetch Tracks, Artists, and Statistics from Soundcloud. Made by SharkPool

Google-Spreadsheets.credits: Read and Write Google Spreadsheets. Made by SharkPool

Money-Utilities.credits: Convert Currencies and get Currency Information. Made by SharkPool

Display-Text.credits: Display Advanced Text in Your Projects! Made by SharkPool

Color-Master.credits: Color Utilities and Color Conversions. Made by SharkPool

QR-Codes.credits: Create and Read QR Codes (Client-Side). Made by SharkPool

Runtime-Events.credits: Events from the Runtime. Made by SharkPool

Speech-Bubbles.credits: Customizable Speech Bubbles. Made by SharkPool

Font-Manager.credits: Manage, Create, and Delete Fonts from Your Project. Made by SharkPool and 0znzw

Script-Control.credits: Monitor and Control Scripts in Your Project. Made by SharkPool, Inspired by 0znzw

Layer-Control.credits: Relayer Pen, Video Camera, Backdrops, Sprites and More. Made by SharkPool

Renderer-Control.credits: Control Visuals of Pen, Video Camera, Backdrops, Sprites and More. Made by SharkPool

Timezones.credits: Convert and Get Time in Different Timezones. Made by ion/ammunimium

Perlin-Noise.credits: Generate Perlin Noise. Made by SharkPool

Extra-Controls.credits: New Advanced Control Blocks. Made by SharkPool

More-Operators.credits: New Powerful Operator Blocks. Made by SharkPool

Captchas.credits: Simple Client-Based Captcha Extension, doesnt promise 100% security. Made by SharkPool

Better-Comments.credits: Better Comments with Color and Text Customization. Made by SharkPool

Sprite-Panel.credits: Manage, View, and Apply Properties to Sprites and Clones. Made by SharkPool

DOM-Selector.credits: Read Elements and Create Events from the Website. Made by SharkPool

SVG-Spritesheets.credits: Create and Export SVG Spritesheets. Made by SharkPool

Community-Spotlight.credits: Display and Promote Projects for Free. Made by SharkPool and the Community Spotlight Team

GIF-Manager.credits: Create and Split GIF Files. Made by SharkPool

JSON-Array.credits: Super Fast JSON and Array Extension. Made by SharkPool

My-Blocks-Plus.credits: Better Custom Blocks. Made by SharkPool, CST, and 0znzw

Dropdown-Maker.credits: Create Custom Dropdowns! Best paired with My Blocks+. Made by SharkPool, CST, and 0znzw

Turbo-Skins.credits: Improved Skins Extension. Made by SharkPool, inspired by LilyMakesThings

Scenes.credits: Create Scenes like Unity in Your Project. Made by SharkPool
